subtitleNullable: the use of floor matrix task and the role of visuo-spatial individual measures
descriptionNullable:
The dataset contains all data needed to reproduce the analyses presented in the manuscript titled "Path learning in individuals with Down syndrome: the use of floor matrix task and the role of visuo-spatial individual measures".

Labels for variables are quite obvious. A few clarifications and abbreviations are listed below:
- Age_months indicate the chronological age in months
- SAQ is Everyday Spatial Activity Questionnaire score
- PMA-SR-K1 is the Primary Mental Ability-K1 spatial task
- GPT is Ghost Picture Test
- WM matrix is the Working Memory task (the scores for the simultaneous and sequential versions are in two different columns as indicated)
- "Counterbalancing floor matrix task" indicates whether the Floor Matrix task was first performed in the observer condition and then in the map condition, or vice versa
